description:
FINALLY! - a fully-functional webOS sketch application!  Want to crop a photo?  There's a button for that!  Want to draw curved AND straight lines?  
There's a button for that!  Want to draw circles, squares, hearts, and more?  There's a button for that!  
Want to change line widths, line colors, fill colors and gradient effects?  There's a button for that!  
Want to take a screenshot and have it automatically attached to a text message?  There's a button for that!  
This applications gives you everything you need to enjoy what your webOS device has to offer.  
Complete with instructions and an FAQ section, you will quickly be on your way to creating a masterpiece, and sharing it with friends and family! ***Note: only phone portrait photos and device screencaptures are supported for cropping at this time***
